name: Flip It -Wood block puzzle
description:
Challenge the wood block puzzle.

·how to play
The pushed block and its upper and lower, left and right blocks are turned over.
It is completed if all become brown.

How about brain exercise during commuting time and holiday time?
It is sure to be addicted.
